data.title: Prime Video: Mad Max
data.meta_description: In the ravaged near future, a savage motorcycle gang rules the road. Terrorising innocent civilians while tearing up the streets, the ruthless gang laughs in the face of a police force bent on stopping them. But they underestimate one officer: Max Rockatansky. And when the bikers brutalise Max’s best friend and family, they send him into a mad frenzy that leaves him with only one thing left in...
data.text:
Mad Max

In the ravaged near future, a savage motorcycle gang rules the road. Terrorising innocent civilians while tearing up the streets, the ruthless gang laughs in the face of a police force bent on stopping them. But they underestimate one officer: Max Rockatansky. And when the bikers brutalise Max’s best friend and family, they send him into a mad frenzy that leaves him with only one thing left in...

IMDb 6.81 h 29 min1980

18+
